missions.description:
1941. december 7. Pearl Harbor
Your mission is to destroy all american airplanes. Destroy all 40 enemy fighters and ships!
missions.successed: The mission was succesful. We suffered heavy losses, but we have won. Return to the base and wait for new orders!

missions.description:
1942. february 27. Java Sea
Your mission is to give cover for ally ships. Hold the line for 2 minutes until the reinforcement arrives! Then we can initiate a counterattack.
missions.successed: The mission was succesful again! You got hit by ricochet. Return to the base for immidiate medical care!

missions.description:
1945. august 6. Hirosima
According our intel the americans developed a new weapon which has unseen power! Your mission is to destroy the bomber carrying the weapon, before it reaches the city center!
missions.successed: All ammunition have ran out. You have only one choice...
